description: GatewayAddress describes an address that can be bound to a Gateway.

value.description:
When a value is unspecified, an implementation SHOULD automatically assign an address matching the requested type if possible.

If an implementation does not support an empty value, they MUST set the "Programmed" condition in status to False with a reason of "AddressNotAssigned".

Examples: `1.2.3.4`, `128::1`, `my-ip-address`.
